AI Tools for Education

This guide provides interdisciplinary resources that relate to the study or use of AI at UC, including tools for teaching, presentations, and learning.

AI Tools for Teaching

See below for a selection of AI tools on developing lesson plans, differentiating materials, creating quizzes, and assisting with assessment. Click the links below or use the left navigation menu for links to these AI tools and full resource descriptions.

  • Diffit: Creates differentiated lessons based on prompts, videos, and documents 

  • Magic School AI: Provides a wide range of tools for educators 

  • ConkerAI: Creates quizzes on a given topic or text inputs

  • Microsoft Reading Progress: Provides automated reading fluency check

Note: Teachers need to refrain from sharing student data with these tools without checking their institution and school district policies. They should consult with their institutions and school districts to ensure that the use of these tools and the sharing of student data are permitted.
